title: I WILL PLAY LEAGUE OF LEGENDS AGAIN

embed.description: For the fans, and because Epic is somehow worse than Riot. In regards to coaching, since I didn't cover it in the vid and I know you are wondering: Coaching will cost 50$ for replay reviews. I am doing this price because I don't want you to buy it truthfully.

body:
I thought the thumbnail was Dunkey returning, but it turned out to be Neace. He said he hated LoL & the direction that Riot games was taking the game but now he says the exact same thing about Epic Games & Fortnite. 

I guess enough of his fans convinced him back to the game after nearly a year of officially quitting....or maybe there is an incoming revival of League since I've noticed a lot of content makers returning to the community
